dc_title_s: Africa, corrected from observations of Mess. of ye Royal Societies at London and Paris
dc_description_s: Decorative title cartouche depicting animals. Dedication: To Owen Brigstocke of Lechdony in the County of Carmarthen. Shows boundaries, rivers, forests and principal settlements, with tents symbolising areas inhabited by nomads, and notes. "by C Price at ye Archimedes & Globe in Ludgate Street, London, where are made all sorts of Globes & Maps, 1711." Relief shown pictorially. London meridian. Original version published London: C. Price & I. Senex, 1711. Scale 1:10,000,000
